                    ColumnWidth =945
                    TabIndex =3
                    Name ="Win_EXN"
                    ControlSource ="Win_EXN"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x82d9bf7009400741b98e80248e3afd31
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =8520
                    LayoutCachedWidth =9060
                    LayoutCachedHeight =225
                    Begin
                        Begin Label
                            Left =7740
                            Width =720
                            Height =225
                            Name ="Label59"
                            Caption ="Win_EXN:"
                            GUID = Begin
                                0x996832741a789649af88ce989f6098ac
                            End
                            LayoutCachedLeft =7740
                            LayoutCachedWidth =8460
                            LayoutCachedHeight =225
                        End
                    End
                End
            End
        End
        Begin Section
            KeepTogether = NotDefault
            CanGrow = NotDefault
            Height =0
            OnFormat ="[Event Procedure]"
            Name ="Detail"
            GUID = Begin
                0x541ecf1d2e94014a9bacd693409b51f7
            End
        End
        Begin PageFooter
            Height =0
            Name ="PageFooterSection"
            GUID = Begin
                0xf01cbc8e82527c429878a1d62490cf98
            End
        End
    End
End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False

'    (at your option) any later version.

'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the

'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private msg As String
Private NewPage As Boolean

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
'GroupHeader1 is Award Data
 
End Sub

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Retreat()
 'GroupHeader 1 is Award Data
End Sub
Private Sub GroupHeader1_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
 'GroupHeader1 is Award Data
End Sub
Private Sub GroupHeader2_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
'GroupHeader2 is Group Data
End Sub
Private Sub GroupHeader2_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
 'GroupHeader 2 is Group Data
End Sub
Private Sub Detail_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Report_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Prior to running the report I must fill in a field used in the sort and
  '   grouping.  The field is in AwardPrize called Script_Sort
  ' For each record in AwardPrize get type and use table AwardPrizeSort to get
  ' the sort order and put it into Script Sort
  ' ALSO  It is difficult to predict and sort etc if EXN and Stud_Num are
  '   Blank (null) so I fix all nulls to '0' here
  ' Open both tables
  Dim statusmsg As String
  Dim AwdPrizeRS As Recordset
  Dim AwdPrizeSortRS As Recordset
  Dim AwdRS As Recordset
  Dim holdsortnum As Integer
  Dim holdtype As String
  Dim oneActive As Boolean
  Dim oneInactive As Boolean
  Dim AllRecords As Boolean
  Dim doActive As Boolean
  Set AwdPrizeRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("AwardPrize", dbOpenDynaset)
  Set AwdPrizeSortRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("AwardPrizeSort", dbOpenDynaset)
  With AwdPrizeRS
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF
       holdtype = IIf(IsNull(!Type), " ", !Type)
       With AwdPrizeSortRS
          .FindFirst ("Type = '" & holdtype & "'")
          If Not .NoMatch Then
             holdsortnum = !sort
          Else
             holdsortnum = 0  ' for unknown types make it sort at top
          End If
       End With
       .Edit
       If IsNull(!EXN) Then !EXN = 0
       If IsNull(!Stud_Num) Then !Stud_Num = 0
       !Script_Sort = holdsortnum
       .Update
       .MoveNext
    Loop
  End With
  ' Now set the criteria for searching records specific to the Script
  ' real script msg = "(NOT isnull(Win_EXN)) and Win_EXN <> 98 and Win_Exn <> 99 AND Win_EXN <> 0"
  msg = "[Status] = 'A'"
  Me.FilterOn = True
  Dim script As String

  script = InputBox("Which Script?" & vbCrLf & _
           "'A' ALL Active  (Combined,Junior,Senior)" & vbCrLf & _
           "'C' Combined (Active)" & vbCrLf & _
           "'S' Senior or Default Senior (Active)" & vbCrLf & _
           "'J' Junior or Default Junior (Active)" & vbCrLf & _
           "'I' Inactive Awards " & vbCrLf & _
           "'T' Total Active and Inactive")
  ' check if any active
  oneInactive = False
  oneActive = False
  AllRecords = False
  Set AwdRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("AwardMaster", dbOpenDynaset)
  With AwdRS
     .FindFirst ("[Status] = 'A'")
     If Not .NoMatch Then oneActive = True
     .FindFirst ("[Status] Is Null OR [Status] <> 'A'")
     If Not .NoMatch Then oneInactive = True
     .Close
  End With
  doActive = True
  Select Case script
  Case "S"
     msg = "[TestScriptAssy] = 'S' AND " & msg
  Case "C"
     msg = "[TestScriptAssy] = 'C' AND " & msg
  Case "J"
     msg = "[TestScriptAssy] = 'J' AND " & msg
  Case "A"
     ' leave it just as is
  Case "I"
     msg = "[Status] Is Null OR [Status] <> 'A'"
     doActive = False
  Case "T"
     AllRecords = True
     msg = "T"
  End Select
  If msg = "T" Then
    Me.Filter = ""
  Else
    Me.Filter = msg
  End If
  AwdPrizeRS.Close
  AwdPrizeSortRS.Close

  If doActive = True And oneActive = False Then
    MsgBox ("There are no Active records")
    Cancel = True
  End If
  If doActive = False And oneInactive = False Then
    MsgBox ("There are no InActive records")
    Cancel = True
  End If
  If MsgBox("Do you want to see the nity gritty detail of " & vbCrLf & _
             "how the script is constructed and sorted? ", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, "Short Script") = vbYes Then
    MsgBox "Used to Check Script Order and Award Data." & vbCrLf & _
           "DOES NOT REQUIRE/LIST EXHIBIT INFORMATION" & vbCrLf & _
          "Notes and Reminders about the Script" & vbCrLf & _
         "1. Special Headings should be 'Active' and have EXN = 100" & vbCrLf & _
         "2. TOC Awards Descriptions (Sponsored by ..) must match the " & vbCrLf & _
         "      'Sponsor' Field in 'Categories' table!" & vbCrLf & _
         "3. Which Assembly? C, J, S or Unknown " & vbCrLf & _
         "    - AwardMaster.C_Assem = true forces to Combined Assembly. " & vbCrLf & _
         "    - If NO Winning Exhibit's entered then G_DIV determines 'J' or 'S')" & vbCrLf & _
         "      (IF G_DIV is not 'J' or 'S' Assembly is Unknown at this time)" & vbCrLf & _
         "    - If Winning Exhibits entered, Exhibit's Division sets 'J' or 'S' Assembly." & vbCrLf & _
         "4. How Sorted? " & vbCrLf & _
         "    Combined uses AwardMaster.C_Assem_Sort field" & vbCrLf & _
         "    Junior and Senior use AwardMaster.J/S_Assem_Sort field" & vbCrLf & _
         "    (see next message for more details)"

   MsgBox "Sort Details  " & vbCrLf & _
         " REPORT USES QUERY 'xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data'" & vbCrLf & _
         " Fields in the query determine various sorts. The 'criteria' set up" & vbCrLf & _
         "      in the fields can be changed to change sort orders" & vbCrLf & _
         "      however, do this with great caution:" & vbCrLf & _
         " " & vbCrLf & _
         " Test Script Sort order and 'fields' used:" & vbCrLf & _
         "   1st= 'TestScriptAssy':  'C' or 'J' Or 'S' (G_DIV default) or 'Unknown'." & vbCrLf & _
         "      'C' if Awards.C_Assem = True (checked) " & vbCrLf & _
         "      'J' or 'S' or 'Unknown' determined by: " & vbCrLf & _
         "         Exhibit's Division or, If No Winning Exhibit entered ... " & vbCrLf & _
         "         G_DIV or if G_DIV not 'J' or 'S' then 'Unknown' " & vbCrLf & _
         "   2nd= 'TestAssySort': 'C'ombined sorts by field 'C_Assy_Sort'." & vbCrLf & _
         "         'J' & 'S' sort by field 'J/S_Assy_Sort'." & vbCrLf & _
         "         Note: 'AN' at end of 'AssySort' ensures unique grouping" & vbCrLf & _
         "   3rd= 'GrpGN'     (The Group part of GID)" & vbCrLf & _
         "   4th= 'Script_Sort' This report fills the field 'Script_Sort'" & vbCrLf & _
         "         using AwardPrize.Type and table AwardPrizeSort" & vbCrLf & _
         "   5th= 'PN'            (Prize Number)" & vbCrLf & _
         "   6th= 'F_ORD'  ( Only if Winning Exhibit's entered - Student Form Order - For Teams)"
  End If
  
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
